title: Game Character Pirate Sound Effects
description: Raise sails and drop anchor! Now you can set forth on an epic journey across the seven seas with our one of kind voice over sound library.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Introducing Game Character Pirate, a game-ified collection of pirate-themed voiceover audio files featuring a male privateer in search of booty, rum, raiding, and of course pillaging.


Inspired by Pirates of the Caribbean, MMO, RTS, and RPG games Game Character Pirate voiceover sound library provides you with 411 immersive, game-ready voiceover sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom dialogue lines, and everything needed to create interactive & compelling cinematic scenes, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.


All of the recordings are delivered in 44.1khz/16bit .wav file format, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitching shifting and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. By the way, you can check out our other game character voice over sound packs here.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 411 pirate themed fantasy character voice-over audio files
  • Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, films, and trailers
  • 17 battle cries and sayings
  • 9 breathing files like – Out of Breathe, Single, Slow, Heavy
  • 15 coughs – hack, ahem, inhale smoke, throat clearing, sick
  • 12 crying sounds – muffled, sad, sniffling, sorrow, wailing
  • 146 immersive dialogue lines for trailers and games like all hands on deck, abandon ship, dead men tell no tales
  • 17 fight vocals – attack, grunt, big growl, swing & more
  • 21 jumping vocalizations – double jump, long, short, rahhh, yarrrr & more
  • 18 laughing voice files – big, explosive, muffled, pleased, tickled, quiet, chuckle
  • 24 pain vocals – dying breath, yell, death, pain, stabbed, wounded,
  • 132 stock dialogue lines for basic interactions in-game like yes master, you are victorious, triple kill & more

Number of Audio Waves: 411

Number of Audio Cues: 411

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: N/A

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,
